Parameters:
Name Type Description
name String
head String
Source:
  • amdquery.js, line 496
Example
aQuery.util.camelCase("margin-left") // return "marginLeft"
aQuery.util.camelCase("border-redius", "webkit") // return "webkitBorderRedius"
